auth-blackout-time.help: Time in seconds an IP address is denied access after failing to authenticate five times within one minute.
auth-blackout-time.name: auth-blackout-time

auth-ca-cert.help: HTTPS CA certificate for policy authentication.
auth-ca-cert.name: auth-ca-cert

auth-cert.help: HTTPS server certificate for policy authentication.
auth-cert.name: auth-cert

auth-http-basic.help: Enable/disable use of HTTP basic authentication for identity-based firewall policies.
auth-http-basic.name: auth-http-basic

auth-invalid-max.help: Maximum number of failed authentication attempts before the user is blocked.
auth-invalid-max.name: auth-invalid-max

auth-lockout-duration.help: Lockout period in seconds after too many login failures.
auth-lockout-duration.name: auth-lockout-duration

auth-lockout-threshold.help: Maximum number of failed login attempts before login lockout is triggered.
auth-lockout-threshold.name: auth-lockout-threshold

auth-on-demand.help: Always/implicitly trigger firewall authentication on demand.
auth-on-demand.name: auth-on-demand

options.help: Always trigger firewall authentication on demand.
options.name: always

options.help: Implicitly trigger firewall authentication on demand.
options.name: implicitly

auth-portal-timeout.help: Time in minutes before captive portal user have to re-authenticate (1 - 30 min, default 3 min).
auth-portal-timeout.name: auth-portal-timeout

port.help: Non-standard port for firewall user authentication.
port.name: port

auth-ports.help: Set up non-standard ports for authentication with HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, and TELNET.
auth-ports.name: auth-ports

auth-secure-http.help: Enable/disable redirecting HTTP user authentication to more secure HTTPS.
auth-secure-http.name: auth-secure-http

auth-src-mac.help: Enable/disable source MAC for user identity.
auth-src-mac.name: auth-src-mac

options.help: Enable source MAC for user identity.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable source MAC for user identity.
options.name: disable

auth-ssl-allow-renegotiation.help: Allow/forbid SSL re-negotiation for HTTPS authentication.
auth-ssl-allow-renegotiation.name: auth-ssl-allow-renegotiation

auth-ssl-max-proto-version.help: Maximum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is no limit).
auth-ssl-max-proto-version.name: auth-ssl-max-proto-version

auth-ssl-min-proto-version.help: Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
auth-ssl-min-proto-version.name: auth-ssl-min-proto-version

auth-ssl-sigalgs.help: Set signature algorithms related to HTTPS authentication (affects TLS version <= 1.2 only, default is to enable all).
auth-ssl-sigalgs.name: auth-ssl-sigalgs

options.help: Disable RSA-PSS signature algorithms for HTTPS authentication.
options.name: no-rsa-pss

options.help: Enable all supported signature algorithms for HTTPS authentication.
options.name: all

auth-timeout.help: Time in minutes before the firewall user authentication timeout requires the user to re-authenticate.
auth-timeout.name: auth-timeout

auth-timeout-type.help: Control if authenticated users have to login again after a hard timeout, after an idle timeout, or after a session timeout.
auth-timeout-type.name: auth-timeout-type

radius-ses-timeout-act.help: Set the RADIUS session timeout to a hard timeout or to ignore RADIUS server session timeouts.
radius-ses-timeout-act.name: radius-ses-timeout-act

options.help: Use session timeout from RADIUS as hard-timeout.
options.name: hard-timeout
